biotools.summary: AI tool that is able to perform a categorisation of MR series by using standardized DICOM tags. The categorisation includes the type of sequence (e.g. spin echo, gradient echo), the weighting (e.g. T1W, T2W, DCE, ...), the presence of fat suppression and the detection of non-relevant / junk series (e.g. localizers, calibrations, screenshots...).

bioschemas.name: ML model for MR series categorisation (EUCAIM-SW-011_T-01-01-011)
